name: CULT
description: An easy and simple yet complex WhatsApp bot developed by Mariana

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for the bot

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Automatically read contact statuses (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Automatically download and send contact statuses (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Allow other users to use your bot in private messages (type yes to activate or no to deactivate; don't use capital letters)

BOT_NAME.description: Set a name for your bot

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Type yes to put your bot in public mode or no for private mode

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID; make sure it starts with eyJub2I...

WARN_COUNT.description: Set the limit of warnings for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Type yes to show a starting-bot-message or no to disable it

PRESENCE.description: ðŸ“Œ Set the presence status: ALWAYS ONLINE 1 / TYPING 2 / RECORDING AUDIO.... 3. Type the number you prefer.
